question: Which Indian sprinter has won the 10 km race of Nepal's Chief of Army Staff (COAS) Open Marathon and Run for Fun held in Kathmandu?
explanation: India\'s Shashank Shekhar has won the 10 kilometre race of Nepal\'s Chief of Army Staff (COAS) Open Marathon and Run for Fun held in Kathmandu. Shekhar of Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) Contingent at Embassy of India in Kathmandu secured first position. RD Murgan also from CISF got third place. A total nine CISF personnel participated in 10 KM race category. The remaining seven personnel also successfully completed run and received Certificate of Achievement. COAS Open Marathon and Run for Fun is an annual event organised by the Nepal Army.
